aircraft.value: Stormbird Attack - AC-5955-390 at Forward Operating Base-1

defect_observed.value: Pneumatic starter motor overheat. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Component fatigue due to operational stress cycles exceeding design limits

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective De-icing System component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

preventive_action.value: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 21/07/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 22/07/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 23/07/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 25/07/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 26/07/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao
